vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.5;
father of: Elizur (H0468)
§ Shedeur = "darter of light"
father of Elizur, chief of the tribe of Reuben at the time of the exodus
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Elisur, jefe; tribu de Rubén
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示丟珥 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "迅光"
出埃及時, 流便支派首領以利蓿的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
示丢珥 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "迅光"
出埃及时, 流便支派首领以利蓿的父亲
